perturbation.original_text:
1.  DEFINITIONS
     1.1. AFFILIATE shall mean, when used with reference to a party, any
individual or entity directly or indirectly controlling, controlled by or under
common control with such party. For purposes of this definition, "control" means
the direct or indirect ownership of at least 50% of the outstanding voting
securities of a party, or the right to control the policy decisions of such
party.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.  DEFINITIONS
     1.1. AFFILIATE shall mean, when used with reference to a party.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specific definition of 'control', it creates ambiguity. Later sections referencing 'Affiliates' and their control are now open to interpretation, creating uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text:
4.6.  REVENUE SHARING. Impresse shall pay VerticalNet [*]of Impresse
VerticalNet Revenue accruing during the term of this Agreement, payable to
VerticalNet on or before the thirtieth day of the calendar quarter
immediately following the quarter in which such revenue was collected by
Impresse. Such payments shall be accompanied by a statement containing
reasonable detail of the type and number of transactions from which the
Impresse
perturbation.changed_text:
4.6. REVENUE SHARING. Impresse shall pay VerticalNet a portion of Impresse
VerticalNet Revenue accruing during the term of this Agreement, payable to
VerticalNet on or before the thirtieth day of the calendar quarter
immediately following the quarter in which such revenue was collected by
Impresse. Such payments shall be accompanied by a statement containing
reasonable detail of the type and number of transactions from which the
Impresse
perturbation.explanation: Removing the specific percentage introduces ambiguity. While the obligation to share revenue remains, the lack of a defined amount makes enforcement challenging and contradicts any expectation of a fixed percentage in later clauses.

perturbation.original_text:
1.20. TERM shall have the meaning set forth in Section 5.1  [TERMINATION AND RENEWAL]
     5.1. The Term of this Agreement shall begin on the Effective Date and shall
end fifteen months therefrom.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.20. TERM shall have the meaning set forth in Section 5.1  [TERMINATION AND RENEWAL]
     5.1. The Term of this Agreement shall begin on the Effective Date.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the end date of the agreement creates an open ended agreement. The contradiction arises in that the contract refers to a Term but does not explicitly define when it ends. This could conflict with sections referencing actions to take place at the end of the term, as the end is now undefined.
